title: Royal Ranthambhore National Park Escape with Daily All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Located just 700 metres from the world-renowned Ranthambhore National Park, Nahargarh Ranthambhore is a palatial resort brought to you by the Royal Alsisar family. The royal jungle abode is approximately seven hours away from NCR, five hours from Agra and a short three hours and thirty minutes from Jaipur, making connectivity no issue at all.

With its old-world charm and indulgent amenities, this retreat lives up to its royal ties. The dining hall boasts intricate mirror work on the walls and ceiling, turning your dining experience into a grand affair, and the Hathi Kund swimming area is an architectural wonder that has to be seen to be believed. Wildlife enthusiasts will be in awe on a Ranthambhore safari, where you can spot beautiful tigers, leopards, hyenas, and more roaming freely in their home.

title: Palatial Ranthambore Luxury with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Located just a 15-minute drive from the world-renowned Ranthambore National Park, Nahargarh Ranthambhore is a palatial retreat brought to you by the Royal Alsisar family. With its old-world charm, tranquil wilderness setting and indulgent amenities, Nahargarh Ranthambhore invites you to experience Ranthambore in its purest form. Enjoy all-inclusive meals (daily breakfast, lunch and dinner), a bottle of wine in the room once during the stay, a welcome drink each on arrival, a 20% discount on dining and drinks, a wildlife documentary screening in the courtyard every evening, and cookies served with tea and coffee every morning and evening.

**Travelling with family?** Two kids (aged 11 years and under) stay free with all inclusions sleeping in existing bedding.

title: Five-Star Wildlife Escape in Ranthambore with All Meals Inclusive
description: Answer the call of the wild at The Oberoi Vanyavilas in Ranthambore, a unique wildlife escape surrounded by thick jungle and furnished with luxurious tents that hark back to the royal caravans of a bygone era. One of the best resorts in Ranthambore, honoured with awards like the Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Best of the Best Award 2022 (Top 25 Luxury Hotels in India), among others. The resort is conveniently located just three hours from Jaipur International Airport and eight hours from Delhi. Indulge in Rajasthani specialities at the Dining Room, or sip a drink in the classic Lobby Bar. Welcome to the jungle with touches of personalised Oberoi hospitality!

title: Regal Ranthambore Jungle Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Welcome to Ranthambhore Kothi: a regal wildlife retreat, located just minutes from the renowned Ranthambore National Park. Scattered across a 3.5-acre landscape, dotted with luscious and wild jungle foliage, Ranthambhore Kothi offers accommodation inspired by colonial British bungalows and is home to the largest pool in the area.

Swap city views for lush nature and animal sightings, spending your days amid the green spaces of the resort or on exciting wildlife safaris (charges apply). Easily accessible from Jaipur (three-hour drive) and Delhi (eight-hour drive), Ranthambhore Kothi is perfect for a wildlife-fuelled weekend escape.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin the day's adventures with daily buffet breakfast at Daawat Restaurant
- End every night with buffet/three-course dinner at Daawat Restaurant
- Toast your escape with one cocktail, beer or glass of wine per adult (one per person, per stay) at Lounge Bar or the open deck of Lounge Bar
- Recharge with daily high tea and cookies at Lounge Bar or the garden next to Daawat Restaurant
- Make the most of your stay with a 20% discount on additional drinks and dining
- Learn about the local wildlife during an evening documentary show
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** One child (under 6) stays free on existing bedding with all inclusions as per package purchased (except alcohol).

title: Ranthambore Wildlife Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Drinks & One Dinner
description:
The Baagh Ananta Elite Ranthambore, a luxurious oasis perched on the edge of the renowned Ranthambore National Park, is a haven for nature lovers just waiting to be discovered. Merely a 20-minute drive from the famous tiger reserve and three hours from Jaipur, this wildlife paradise promises a jungle escape like no other. The resort provides you with a unique stay in Ranthambore by reflecting the surrounding wilderness and jungle theme in their interiors, living up to their motto of 'service with a smile', and combining opulent amenities with the finest elegance. 

Choose from any one of the thoughtfully designed rooms, cottages or tents scattered across the lush wilderness of the property and unwind in peace. Enjoy spotting the big cats of Ranthambore on a safari, head to the onsite restaurant, Oasis, for tantalising meals, unwind in the spa with a rejuvenating massage, or simply splash around the gorgeous pool... Choices are aplenty. Upgrade to our all-inclusive package and enjoy delectable breakfast, lunch and dinner every day.
offer_address: Village Kuthalpura Post Khilchipur, Ranthambore Rajasthan 322001 India

title: Boutique Ranthambore Wildlife Escape with Daily Breakfast & One Dining Experience
description:
In a land far away from urban chaos, dotted with awe-inspiring landscapes and dominated by tigers, is The Kipling Lodge - Nature Kalp, Ranthambore. Enjoy true jungle luxury in this secluded retreat that features colonial-inspired accommodation, a stunning open-air swimming pool, a beautiful outdoor restaurant and a host of excursions, from jungle safaris to pottery classes. Merely a 20-minute drive from the famous Ranthambore National Park and a three-hour drive from Jaipur, The Kipling Lodge - Nature Kalp puts you in close proximity to the exotic wilderness of one of India's most renowned tiger reserves.

Enjoy splendid meals at the restaurant, unwind with rejuvenating therapies at the spa, indulge in cultural experiences, spot the big cats on wildlife safaris... there's plenty to do at The Kipling Lodge - Nature Kalp. Whether you're a wildlife enthusiast or just want to take some time out from the city, this boutique retreat will not disappoint.

title: Relaxing Ranthambore Jungle-Themed Escape with Daily Breakfast & Dinner
description: Aamaghati Wildlife Resort in Ranthambore is a jungle-themed sanctuary that places you right in the middle of Rajasthan's tiger wonderland. A luxe wilderness retreat, Aamaghati boasts the largest rooms in the town, each named after a tiger in Ranthambore and featuring jungle-inspired decor. Head out on safaris to spot the big cats with the Ranthambore Tiger Reserve being less than a 5-minute drive from the resort. Take a dip in one of the resort's two swimming pools or just relax while taking in the breathtaking views of the Aravallis. Treat your taste buds to some delicious meals at the multi-cuisine Baradari restaurant. If it's relaxation you seek, head to Sri Sri Wellbeing Centre, where you can unwind with a rejuvenating massage or two.
offer_address: Aamaghati Wildlife Resort Near Govt Primary School, Ranthambore Road, Sherpur, Sawai Madhopur, Rajasthan, 322001 India

Whether you're a wildlife enthusiast or just want to take some time out from the city, this boutique retreat will not disappoint.

vendor_name: The Tree Of Life Kipling Lodge Ranthambore
title: Ranthambore National Park Jungle Escape with Gourmet Experiences
description: Situated right on the fringe of the famous Ranthambore National Park is a haven boasting wildlife, serenity and seclusion: Tree of Life Kipling Jungle Lodge, probably one of the remote places in the country. Enjoy true jungle luxury in this secluded retreat that features colonial-inspired accommodation, a stunning open-air swimming pool, a beautiful outdoor restaurant and a host of excursions from jungle safaris to yoga, cooking classes and more.
location_description: Tree of Life Kipling Jungle Lodge
offer_address: Village Charoda, Ranthambhore Rd, Sawai Madhopur, Rajasthan 322021
